column1: The GenBank ( ( http: / / www. ncbi. nlm. nih. gov / Genbank) accession numbers for the genes and gene products discussed in this paper are Apc ( NM _ 007462), beta - catenin ( NM _ 007614), AXIN 2 ( NM _ 004655), plakoglobin ( NM _ 002230), Asef ( NM _ 015320), kinesin superfamily - associated protein 3 ( NM _ 014970), EB1 ( NM _ 012325), human homolog of Drosophila Discs large ( U13897), Lef1 ( NM _ 010703), Dkk1 ( NM _ 010051), K1 ( NM _ 008473), K5 ( NM _ 027011), K6 ( NM _ 008476), K8 ( NM _ 031170), K14 ( NM _ 016958), involucrin ( NM _ 008412), loricrin ( NM _ 008508), and Shh ( NM _ 009170).
